name: Smartaero
about: Smartaero, located near Warsaw at Modlin Airport (EPMO), is a flight school dedicated to providing comprehensive and personalized aviation training. We conduct all training in compliance with PART-FCL regulations and offer individual conversion programs to cater to the unique needs of each student. Upon enrollment, each candidate is assigned a dedicated instructor who proposes a tailored "learning path" to ensure optimal progress. Our training facilities operate year-round, day and night, ensuring flexibility for our students. With a focus on individual approach and compliance with stringent aviation standards, Smartaero is committed to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation goals. Join us to embark on a professional and fulfilling aviation journey.
